LanguageData.ARA_DummyAmmo.label: ammunition
LanguageData.ARA_DummyAmmo.description: Ammunition used by the Arachne Bug Tribe.
LanguageData.ARA_Filth_SpentAcid.label: arachne residual acid
LanguageData.ARA_Turret_Beespikeshooter.label: bee spike shooter
LanguageData.ARA_Turret_Beespikeshooter.description: A small turret that fires poisonous stingers.
LanguageData.ARA_Gun_Beespikeshooter.label: bee spike shooter
LanguageData.ARA_Gun_Beespikeshooter.description: It is an organization that fires small poisonous stingers.
LanguageData.Arachnae_AcidlingTrap.label: Arachne exploding cocoon
LanguageData.Arachnae_AcidlingTrap.description: It is a dormant cocoon that contains dormant Arachne insects.If you get too close, the insects inside will wake up.
LanguageData.ARA_AutoSniperCannon.label: blood rock gigabit cannon organization
LanguageData.ARA_AutoSniperCannon.description: It is one of the burrow defense organizations of the Arachne insects.It is composed of highly specialized organs without autonomy, and fires barbs at high speed, seriously injuring large enemies and invading groups.As a defense organization, it can automatically generate replenishment ammunition by acquiring nutrients.
LanguageData.Gun_ARA_AutoSniperCannonTurret.label: blood rock gigabit cannon
LanguageData.ARA_Acidling_AutoMortar.label: Explosive Launcher Nest Organization
LanguageData.ARA_Acidling_AutoMortar.description: It is one of the burrow defense organizations of the Arachne insects.It is composed of a group of highly specialized organs without autonomy, and fires multiple Arachne explosive seed insects at invading enemies.The insects automatically search for targets and carry out suicide attacks.As a defense organization, they can automatically generate replenishment ammunition by acquiring nutrients.
LanguageData.ARA_Acidling_Artillery_AutoMortar.label: Explosive launcher nest
LanguageData.ArachnaeBase_Race_Acidling_Proj.label: Arachne explosive species
LanguageData.CatastropheMissileSilo.label: disaster acid cannon organization
LanguageData.CatastropheMissileSilo.description: It is one of the ultimate biological weapons evolved by the Arachne insects. It is composed of a group of highly specialized organs without autonomy, and a formidable acid cannon fires disaster acid missiles. As a complex defense system, it is capable of firing at local targets and precision strikes against long-range threats, and can automatically generate replenishment ammunition by acquiring nutrients.
LanguageData.CatastropheMissile_Weapon.label: disaster acid cannon
LanguageData.CatastropheMissile_Weapon.description: It is the main body of the Disaster Acid Cannon organization and is responsible for launching and guiding semi-autonomous disaster acid missiles.
LanguageData.ARA_CatastropheMissile_Shell.label: disaster acid missile
LanguageData.ARA_CatastropheMissile_Shell.description: A disaster acid missile used by the Arachne Bug Tribe, which can only be launched by the Disaster Acid Cannon organization.
LanguageData.Projectile_CatastropheMissile.label: disaster acid missile
LanguageData.Projectile_CatastropheMissile_Fake.label: disaster acid missile
